price: 37. et à qui, parmi vous, veut aller au-devant (des ordres de son Seigneur), ou préfère rester en arrière.
arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: liman shāa minkum an yataqaddama aw yata-akhara
